cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's banzai
Remember this word you see, it's hatachi

sentence.kanji: 妹は来年、二十歳になります。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha rainen hatachi ni narimasu
sentence.english: My little sister will be 20 next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moeru
Remember this word you see, it's ken

sentence.romaji: ken no daihyou ha nimei desu
sentence.english: There are two representatives of the prefecture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saimatsu

sentence.kanji: デパートの歳末大売出しが始まったよ。
sentence.romaji: depa-to no saimatsu oouridashi ga hajimata yo
sentence.english: Year-end sales have begun at the department stores.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenritsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は県立の高校に通っているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kenritsu no koukou ni kayote iru yo
sentence.english: He goes to the prefectural high school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moyasu

sentence.kanji: 古い手紙を燃やしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: furui tegami wo moyashita n da

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's someru

sentence.romaji: kami wo aka ni somete mita
sentence.english: I tried dyeing my hair red.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oseibo

sentence.kanji: デパートでお歳暮を送りました。
sentence.english: I sent year-end gifts from the department store.
